c74object.name: fl.lag~
c74object.digest: Outputs vector-type frames with a lag set as an integer number of frames.
c74object.description: Frames are expected to be of a uniform size, else the buffer is reset. The output is the same size as the input.

entry.name: 0. /max_frames [int]
entry.description: Sets the maximum number of frames that can be set as a lag time.

entry.name: 1. /num_frames [int]
entry.description: Sets the current lag as an integer number of frames.
